example.parse: (TOP (S (NP-ADV (ADJ_NUM+CASE_INDEF_ACC ثانياً)) (PUNC :) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS كرر) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الوزير) (NOUN_PROP فرنجية)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (SBAR-NOM-TPC-1 (WHNP-2 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (DET+NOUN.VN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_ACC المطالبين) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN السيادة)))))) (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:I يريدون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (S-NOM-OBJ (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_ACC ابدال) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN النفوذ) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN السوري)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN النفوذ) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الاميركي))))))))) (PUNC .)))
